version_description:
To make our app better for you, we make ongoing updates to improve your listening experience.
1. Optimized UI.
2. Stability performance improvements and bug fixes.

In this release, we optimized UI and improved the overall reliability to present you with better listening experience.
Leave us your reviews and feedback, Thank you!

In this release, we optimized UI and improved the overall reliability to present you with better listening experience.
Leave us your reviews and feedback, Thank you!

To make our app better for you, we make ongoing updates to improve your listening experience. Thank you for choosing Fire & Police Scanner Radio.
• Added a Contact Us section within settings
• UI improvements
• Bug fixes

To make our app better for you, we make ongoing updates to improve your listening experience. Thank you for choosing Fire & Police Scanner Radio.
• UI improvements
• Bug fixes

Dear police scanner users,
In this release, you would be able to see the distance of the police scanner radio nearby; Besides, the alerts of the active feeds will be displayed on the feeds list.
We also make ongoing updates to improve your listening experience.
You can share the feeds with your friends, thank you for choosing Fire & Police Scanner Radio.

Dear police scanner users,
This update includes bug fixes, we also make ongoing updates to improve your listening experience.
You can share the feeds with your friends, thank you for choosing Fire & Police Scanner Radio.

This update includes bug fixes, we also make ongoing updates to improve your listening experience.
You can share the feeds with your friends, thank you for choosing Fire & Police Scanner Radio.

Dear police scanner users,
This update includes Walkie Talkie functionality, you could push to talk to other police scanner users all over the country or the world, we also make ongoing updates to improve your listening experience.
Share the feeds with your friends, thank you for choosing Fire & Police Scanner Radio.

Dear police scanner users,
In this release, we have optimized the display of alerts to make it more convenient for you to view.
This update also includes bug fixes, share the feeds with your friends, thank you for choosing Fire & Police Scanner Radio.

Hey there, loyal users!

This update includes bug fixes.

Your feedback makes Police Scanner better. Keep it coming! Please email us at contact@policescanner.us We read it all.

By the way, your reviews are very helpful for us. If you think Police Scanner is worthy, would you mind taking a moment to write a review? We'd greatly appreciate it. :)
